titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to transfer a certain parcel of land in Clark County, Nevada.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 6/15/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to transfer specified land to Clark County, Nevada, for use as a site to build Boys Town USA of Las Vegas for homeless, abused, and neglected youth. Reserves mineral rights in such land to the United States.
